name: Sign-in through social networks
description: If there is an option to sign-in through social network, you have to be sure that original sources of traffic parameters are not overwritten.

blocks.description: This test fails if in dimension source are „accounts.google.com“, in case of Facebook in full referrer facebook „auth“
blocks.passMessage: There are no sign-ins through social networks among the source of traffic.
blocks.failMessage: Sign-ins through social networks are source of traffic.
blocks.failHowtofix: Sign-ins through social networks should be excluded on „referral exclusion list“ on property level.
blocks.failTableDescribe: Sample of up to 10 sign-ins through social networks:
